description: This class provides configuration for Spring Data AuditorAware, retrieving the current auditor's identity from the ApiRequestContextHolder, defaulting to 'SYSTEM_USER' if no auth ID is available.

classes.name: AuditorAwareConfig
classes.description: Configuration class implementing AuditorAware for auditing purposes in Spring Data, providing the current user's identity.

methods.name: getCurrentAuditor
methods.description: Returns an Optional containing the current auditor's identifier, defaulting to 'SYSTEM_USER' if no auth ID is present.
